tasks.label: Git commit and push dashboard fix
tasks.command:
git add public/lib/boot/dashboard-main.js && git commit -m 'Fix tier regression by removing duplicate tier update in dashboard-main.js

Root cause: dashboard-main.js (line 1822) and dashboard-main.mjs (line 1870) both loading.
dashboard-main.js had duplicate updateBrandTierDisplay() that defaulted to anonymous.
This overwrote correct tier from authready-listener.js causing flash then regression.

Removed lines 841-846: duplicate tier update system with anonymous default.
Tier display now handled exclusively by authready-listener.js (single source).

Fixes tier showing Bronze then Hi Friend regression for degenmentality@gmail.com' && git push origin main

tasks.label: Commit tier and service worker fixes
tasks.command:
git add public/sw.js public/hi-dashboard.html public/lib/boot/dashboard-main.js && git commit -m 'Fix dashboard tier display and service worker

1. sw.js: Remove broken duplicate install event (lines 12-57)
   - Syntax error: incomplete event handler with orphaned array
   - Caused Uncaught SyntaxError preventing page load

2. hi-dashboard.html: Load HiBrandTiers.js BEFORE authready-listener.js
   - Moved from line 278 (defer) to line 188 (immediate)
   - Prevents race condition where authready-listener fires before HiBrandTiers loads
   - Same pattern as Hi Island/Hi Gym fixes

3. dashboard-main.js: Remove duplicate updateBrandTierDisplay (lines 841-846)
   - Competed with authready-listener causing tier regression
   - Defaulted to anonymous overwriting correct tier

Fixes: tier showing Hi Friend instead of Hi Pathfinder for bronze users' && git push origin main

tasks.label: Push all fixes
tasks.command: git add public/sw.js public/hi-dashboard.html public/lib/boot/dashboard-main.js public/profile.html && git commit -m 'Fix dashboard: sw.js APP_SHELL_FILES, tier display, profile syntax' && git push origin main

tasks.label: Deploy fixes
tasks.command:
git add public/sw.js public/hi-dashboard.html public/lib/boot/dashboard-main.js public/profile.html && git commit -m 'Fix 7-day pill race condition + tier display + service worker

1. dashboard-main.js:
   - await initializeDatabase() to ensure ProfileManager ready before 7-day pill
   - Deterministic anonymous preview (removed Math.random causing jitter)
   - Removed duplicate tier updater (authready-listener.js is single source)

2. sw.js: Added missing APP_SHELL_FILES constant

3. hi-dashboard.html: Load HiBrandTiers.js before authready-listener.js

4. profile.html: Fixed corrupted saveProfileToSupabase syntax' && git push origin main
